title: What is Apper?
subtitle: Discover the power of no-code development

sections.heading: What is Apper
sections.content: Apper is your AI app creator. It's not just powered by AI â€” it is AI. Kind of like ChatGPT, but instead of giving you answers, Apper builds fully functional apps based on your inputs in a few minutes.

sections.heading: How Apper Works
sections.content: You don't need to write code, pick design templates, or juggle multiple tools to handle different parts of an app. With Apper, everything happens in one place, all through a simple conversation (chat interface).

sections.heading: Key Benefits
items: Chat in simple, everyday English to describe your app idea
Get fully functional apps built in just a few minutes
No coding, designing, or technical skills required
Everything happens in one unified platform
Apps improve instantly based on your feedback
Complete control through natural conversation

sections.heading: Getting Started Tips
items: Start by describing your app idea in simple terms
Be specific about what you want your app to do
Don't worry about technical details - just explain your vision
Ask for changes or improvements anytime during the conversation
Test your app frequently as it's being built

title: Why Apper Stands Out
subtitle: What makes us different from other platforms

sections.heading: Why Apper Stands Out
sections.content: In a crowded market of app-building tools, Apper takes a fundamentally different approach. While others require you to learn their platform, Apper learns from you. It's the difference between speaking a new language and having a conversation in your own words.

sections.heading: What Makes Us Different
sections.content: Unlike traditional no-code platforms that still require you to understand templates, drag-and-drop interfaces, and technical concepts, Apper works purely through natural conversation. You simply describe what you want, and it builds it for you.

sections.heading: Key Differentiators
items: Pure AI conversation - no templates or drag-and-drop required
Builds complete, functional apps in minutes, not hours or days
No learning curve - if you can chat, you can build apps
Instant iterations - just ask for changes in plain English
One unified platform - no need to switch between multiple tools
Real-time collaboration through shared conversations
Automatically optimized for all devices and screen sizes
Built-in best practices for performance, security, and accessibility

sections.heading: The Apper Advantage
sections.content: Traditional platforms make you adapt to their way of thinking. Apper adapts to yours. Whether you're a business owner with an idea, a designer with a vision, or a developer who wants to prototype quickly, Apper meets you where you are and builds what you need.

sections.heading: Application Types
items: Business websites and landing pages
E-commerce stores and marketplaces
Customer relationship management (CRM) systems
Project management and collaboration tools
Educational platforms and course websites
Portfolio and personal websites
Event management and booking systems
Social networking and community platforms

sections.heading: Industry Solutions
sections.content: Apper serves businesses across all industries. From restaurants managing online orders to consultants tracking client projects, from artists showcasing portfolios to nonprofits organizing events - the possibilities are limitless.

title: Create Your First App
subtitle: Step-by-step guide to building your first application

steps.title: Choose a Template
steps.description: Browse our template library and select one that matches your vision. You can always customize it completely later.

steps.description: Give your app a name and choose your preferred color scheme. These can be changed anytime.

steps.title: Add Your Content
steps.description: Replace placeholder text and images with your own content using our intuitive editor.

steps.title: Customize the Design
steps.description: Use the visual editor to adjust layouts, colors, fonts, and spacing to match your brand.

steps.title: Preview and Test
steps.description: Use our preview mode to test your app on different devices and screen sizes.

title: The Apper Builder Interface
subtitle: Master the tools that will bring your ideas to life

sections.heading: Interface Overview
sections.content: The Apper builder interface is designed for maximum productivity and ease of use. The main workspace shows your app as you build it, while side panels provide access to components, styling options, and settings.

sections.heading: Key Interface Elements
items: Canvas: The main working area where you build your app
Component Library: Pre-built elements to drag and drop
Properties Panel: Customize selected components
Layers Panel: Navigate your app's structure
Preview Mode: Test your app in real-time
Publishing Tools: Deploy your app with one click

sections.heading: Automatic Optimizations
sections.content: Apper automatically optimizes your app for performance, accessibility, and search engines. No additional configuration required.

title: Create Your First App
subtitle: Step-by-step guide to building your first application

sections.heading: Getting Started
sections.content: When you log in to Apper, you'll see a large prompt box in the center of the screen. This is where you tell Apper what kind of app you want to build, just like you're explaining it to a friend.

sections.heading: Example Prompts
items: "I want to build a tool to track customer orders."
"Make an app where users can book sessions and pay online."
"Create a quiz game that gives points and tracks team progress."

sections.heading: Best Practices
sections.content: To help Apper understand your idea more clearly, we strongly recommend refining your prompt first with ChatGPT. This will help you articulate your vision more precisely.

title: Editing and Expanding the App
subtitle: Grow and improve your application over time

sections.heading: Making Changes
sections.content: Your app is never truly finished. Apper makes it easy to update content, add new features, and respond to user feedback. All changes can be made instantly without any downtime.

sections.heading: Expansion Options
items: Add new pages and sections as your business grows
Integrate third-party services and APIs
Set up user accounts and membership systems
Add e-commerce functionality and payment processing
Implement advanced features like search and filtering
Create custom workflows and automation

title: Troubleshooting Errors
subtitle: Common issues and how to solve them

sections.heading: Common Issues
sections.content: Don't worry if you encounter issues while building - it's part of the learning process! Most problems have simple solutions, and our platform provides helpful error messages to guide you.

sections.heading: Quick Fixes
items: Clear your browser cache if the editor seems slow
Check your internet connection for sync issues
Refresh the page if components aren't loading
Use the undo feature to revert unwanted changes
Contact support through the help chat for assistance
Check our knowledge base for detailed troubleshooting guides

title: App Versions
subtitle: Managing different versions of your application

sections.heading: Version Control
sections.content: Apper automatically saves versions of your app as you work, allowing you to revert to previous states if needed. You can also create manual save points before making major changes.

sections.heading: Version Features
items: Automatic daily backups of your app
Manual save points for major milestones
Compare different versions side by side
Restore any previous version with one click
Branch versions for testing new features
Merge changes from different versions
